body.name: Razer Basilisk X Hyperspeed - Wireless Gaming Mouse (Hyperspeed Technology, Advanced 5G Optical Sensor and 6 Configurable Buttons, Mechanical Mouse Switches, Ultra-Long Battery Life) Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Hot Audio and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 46 mins
features: Ultra-fast Razer hyperspeed wireless technology: With low latency and seamless frequency hopping in noisy environments, you won’t even realize you’re gaming with a wireless mouse. With dual-mode, use Bluetooth for extended battery life when working

Razer 5G powerful optical sensor: A 16,000 DPI optical sensor ensures that even the finest movement of your mouse is tracked, giving you an acute level of precision for game-winning headshots and highly elusive maneuvers

Ultra-long battery life: When gaming, Razer hyperspeed lets you to tap on its ultra-fast wireless performance for up to 285 hours. You can also switch to Bluetooth mode for extended use, with up to 450 hours of battery life
Razer mechanical mouse switches: Designed to deliver fast and precise mouse clicks, Razer mechanical mouse switches boasts a durability of up to 50 million clicks- ideal for extensive gaming

6 programmable buttons: The mouse comes with 6 programmable buttons that are fully configurable via Razer synapse 3, giving you access to macros and secondary functions so every action can be executed with ease
body.description: Execute advanced macros and functions seamlessly with a wireless gaming mouse that boasts 11 programmable buttons—including the renowned multi-function paddle. Featuring the fastest wireless connection on any gaming mouse, 20, 000 DPI optical sensor, and an optical Mouse switch that actuates at the speed of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wireless gaming mouse
reviews.reviewText: I swear by this brand. I have had their gaming mice for 11 years now, and they have never disappointed.It may require a PC restart to connect the mouse to your PC through the USB dongle, but it's very responsive.It does not light up like the wired ones do, but it's a really cool mouse, and a phenomenal price point. (I used to pay $80)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best computer accessory.
reviews.reviewText: The Razer brand is excellent for any person that wants high quality products for their computer systems. The Razer mice are awesome, as they are sensitive and have custom sensitivity levels in hand that they are comfortable to use for extended timeframes. I would highly recommend any Razer products for anyone ranging from the serious gamer to a part-time user, as their products will not disappoint.

The media could not be loaded. O produto é bem versátil, uso o bluetooth para trabalhar e conector o receptor USB no Xbox para jogar. A qualidade é incrível e o conforto nem se fala. Quem tem a mão maior e usa pegada palm vai se beneficiar ainda mais.Vi muita gente falando que o produto veio aberto e o meu veio com um rasgo no pacote, mas galera... Vocês tem que entender que quem faz isso é a alfândega. Eles fazem isso pra ter certeza que não tem nenhuma substância (se é que vcs me entendem) dentro do pacote. Aí eles podem abrir ou fazer um rasgo na embalagem (pq eles têm cães que conseguem farejar esse tipo de coisa), mas nada que danifique o produto. É apenas o pessoal da alfândega trabalhando para a segurança de todos, isso não é culpa do vendedor!

Bouton droit défectueux après quelques semaines seulement. C'est la souris que j'ai payé le plus cher et qui a duré le moins longtemps :-(J'ai introduit un ticket de support chez Razer. J'en suis à mon 6ème emails. 1) Expliquer le problème 2) Donner les références du produit 3) Tester une mise à jour 4) Envoyer une vidéo du problème 5) Envoyer ses coordonnées 6) Envoyer la facture... Bref, de quoi vous dégouter de faire appel au support. Cela aurait été traité en 2 secondes dans un point de vente...

Pas grand chose à dire sur cette souris, qui fait bien ce qu'on lui demande: précise, assez légère, les boutons sont accessibles ...Comme beaucoup de souris du genre, on peut en régler le polling rate (temps de réponse, jusque 1 ms), elle contient des profils embarqués, les boutons offrent un ressenti correct.L'excroissance permettant de poser le pouce est pratique.Et le logiciel associé (Razor Cortex) permet quelques personnalisations toujours utiles (gérer les profils) et sympas (effets lumineux sur la molette et le logo de paume).La molette n'est pas la meilleure du monde, et peut avoir un comportement erratique en s'encrassant (ex: vous voulez défiler vers le haut, mais elle commence à défiler vers le bas avant de remonter).Un petit coup de spray nettoyant pour écran ou vitres (alcool), sur la molette, souris débranchée, en la faisant tourner, puis laisser sécher, et c'est reparti pour un tour!Bref, une bonne souris, bien meilleure que des souris premier prix même pour la bureautique, et compétitive en jeu (même si ne dispose pas de 50 boutons :) ).Et la fiabilité semble plus au rendez-vous que de précédents périphériques de la marque que j'ai pu avoir.Je recommande, si le prix est correct :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the first Razer product I’ve bought, but have got a second one as a gift for someone based on how good it is.It’s very light and comfortable, works flawlessly on the desk surface with no noticeable lag. Can work on Bluetooth or using the supplied 2.4GHz WiFi dongle which is cleverly stored inside the device.The supplied single AA battery has lasted for 2 years of fairly infrequent use (using Bluetooth rather than WiFi), which is amazing- and I have never turned the mouse off- it goes to sleep by itself. All buttons are programmable; there are the normal left and right, the scroll wheel, a button behind it which by default changes the sensitivity, and 2 extra ones next to your thumb (you can program macros for them in the supplied software - ours are copy/paste)Only 2 points to be aware of- 1) it is definitively a right handed form factor. Not very friendly for lefties I’m afraid, but if you can use your right hand for the mouse, it is very comfortable.2) No RGB lights. Some people want everything lit up, but personally, I’d rather have a long battery life and no cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The Razer Basilisk X Hyperspeed mouse is great for switching between two computers
reviews.reviewText: The Razer Basilisk X Hyperspeed mouse has a switch enabling you to use either the dongle or Bluetooth. I keep the USB-A dongle in my Windows laptop and connect the mouse through Bluetooth with my MacBook Pro, which lacks a USB-A port. Even when I have both computers turned on, I can use the switch on the bottom of the mouse to easily select either the Windows or MacOS laptop.The mouse also has a button enabling the user to select the sensitivity. This is really handy when using a very large screen, because different tasks might require a different sensitivity to move across the screen.
